subtitle: What if I told you, that, you, have a genie who can make all your wishes come true?
Anything that you wish for - an amazing love life, a successful career, and a good health,
will come true.
That genie of your life is called your belief.
Watch this video till the end and see how you can get anything and everything that you
wish for just by believing in it.
Also, we are giving some free giveaways which I will be talking about at the end of the
video.
You can use your beliefs to live a wonderful, prosperous, happy life, or you can use them
to literally kill yourself.
The law of belief states that whatever you believe and feel to be true long enough will
become your reality.
It means that whatever you subconsciously feel to be true in your inner world, in your
thoughts, long enough, will always show up in your outer world as your experience.
For example: Sarrah, all her adult life had the belief
that she is not attractive.
She tries her best to be stylish and to always put a smile but wherever she goes she feels
uncomfortable about her appearance.
Meanwhile her identical twin, Sophia grew up believing that she is above average.
Whenever they are out together, Sophia always attracts attention from men.
Even from across the room, men always pick Sophia as the one to approach.
This always leaves Sarrah wondering what men see in Sophia that they don’t see in her.
Why is it that everyone is attracted to Sophia and not to Sarrah?
It is because of their beliefs of what they think of themselves.
Sarrah believes that she is unattractive and whenever she is out, her belief leads to the
negative self-talks like I wish I was as attractive like the other women or I should had worn
jeans.
All these negative self-talks and her body language gives people the impression that
she is unhappy, uncomfortable, or not interested.
On the other hand, Sophia always believed that she looks above average.
This belief of her, gives her the confidence to carry herself well.
Her self-talks about her looks are on the lines of black suits me more or I look more
beautiful with my hair untied.
All these positive talking and her body language gives people the impression that she is at
ease with herself.
The truth is you possess infinite power.
The truth is the power of entire universe is inherited in your life.
You can do whatever you believe you can do and be whoever you believe you want to be.
And this is only possible if you have an empowering belief.
So how can you change a limiting belief into an empowering belief?
The first step is identifying your belief.
When you have a limiting or a negative belief, you will have emotions like anger, jealousy,
or anxiety.
These emotions will separate you from achieving whatever you want.
Whenever you have any of these emotions, train yourself to identify the thought that is causing
this emotion.
Stay with this feeling for little longer and concentrate on the thoughts that are running
in your head.
When you uncover these thoughts, write them down.
Do not get lost in the thoughts, just write it down.
If you feel that you cannot identify thoughts associated with your emotion, simply imagine
what thoughts could have produced it.
Once you have made the list of your thoughts, write down the belief behind them.
Write it down in short and concise manner such as “I am not pretty enough” or “I
am not worth it”.
Then step 2 is to examine your Belief.
After writing down the beliefs that are responsible for the thoughts, ask yourself how this belief
has been impacting you.
Ask yourself questions like - in what way these beliefs prevented me from feeling ease
in the world?
How these beliefs stopped me from connecting with other people?
How would my experience be if I did not have these beliefs?
Suppose, if you believe that you are not pretty.
Ask yourself what this belief has done to my confidence?
How it is stopping me from connecting with other people?
How would my experience be if I gave up the belief that I am not pretty?
Step 3 – Create your replacement belief After getting aware of all the harm your belief
has done to you, you will realize it is time to drop the belief.
To drop the belief, you need to create a replacement belief.
A replacement belief is an idea that comes from a place of love and not from a place
of fear.
It is not something you wish it was true but it is something you believe is true.
If you believe that you are not pretty, have a replacement belief like “I feel pretty
when I connect with people”.
Use this new replacement belief whenever you think about your looks.
This will not only help you see in a more loving way but will also allow you to be more
confident when you connect with everyone.
Step 4 – Use this new replacement belief.
Whenever you experience an emotion like jealousy, anxiety, or fear, trace it back to your old
belief and concentrate on this replacement belief.
Use these replacement beliefs to empower yourself.
Constantly reminding yourself with this new empowering belief will free you from the prison
of limiting belief.
Because this new belief is just as true for you and by simply believing in it will transform
your experience.
So, gather your courage and stop your thoughts from concentrating on bad things that are
happening to you, and start believing in good, and good things will come to you.
Do comment below what you truly desire, and every month, we will be gifting 5 different
comments, a book that will help them to achieve everything that they desire.
